fields.name: resourceType
fields.description: The type of the FHIR resource.
fields.note: resourceType must be Encounter

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known.

fields.name: identifier.type
fields.description: The type for the identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.
fields.note: Required if identifier is given.

binding.description: The type used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

fields.name: identifier.system
fields.description: The namespace of the identifier.
fields.note: Required if identifier is given.

fields.name: identifier.value
fields.description: The unique value of the identifier
fields.note: Required if identifier is given.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the encounter.
fields.note: Currently do not support cancelled or entered-in-error.

fields.name: class
fields.description: The classification of the encounter.
fields.note: Direct writing of class is not supported. This field will be inferred on a write.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The specific type of encounter.

binding.description: The type of encounter.
binding.note: Encounters created with meta.security set with code 'UNCERTREL' will be returned with an external encounter type.

binding.description: Broad categorization of the service that is to be provided.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Indicates the urgency of the encounter.

binding.description: Indicates the urgency of the encounter.

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The patient present at the encounter.

fields.name: participant
fields.description: The list of people responsible for providing the service.

fields.name: participant.type
fields.description: Role of participant in encounter.
fields.note: Required if participant is given.

binding.description: Role of participant in encounter.

fields.name: participant.period
fields.description: The start and end times for the period the participant was involved in the encounter.

fields.name: participant.individual
fields.description: The personnel present at the encounter.
fields.note: Required if participant is given.

fields.name: period
fields.description: The start and end times of the encounter.
fields.note: A date with time must be provided.

fields.name: reasonCode
fields.description: The reason that the encounter is taking place.
fields.note: ICD-10 and SNOMED codes along with text fields are supported for reasonCode.

fields.name: hospitalization
fields.description: Details about the admission to a healthcare service.
fields.note: Only the admitSource and dischargeDisposition fields are supported on write.

fields.name: hospitalization.admitSource
fields.description: From where patient was admitted.

binding.description: From where patient was admitted.

fields.name: hospitalization.dietPreference
fields.description: Diet preferences reported by the patient.

binding.description: Medical, cultural or ethical food preferences to help with catering requirements.

fields.name: hospitalization.specialCourtesy
fields.description: The special courtesies applicable to the patient.

binding.description: Special courtesies.

fields.name: hospitalization.specialArrangement
fields.description: The special arrangements made for the patient during the encounter.

binding.description: Special arrangements.

fields.name: hospitalization.dischargeDisposition
fields.description: Category or kind of location after discharge.

binding.description: Discharge Disposition.

fields.name: serviceProvider
fields.description: The organization (facility) responsible for this encounter.
fields.note: • serviceProvider cannot be provided when location is present.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The location where the encounter takes place.
fields.note:
• Only one location reference is permitted.
  • location cannot be provided when serviceProvider is present.

fields.name: custom-attribute
fields.description: A client defined custom attribute for the encounter.
fields.note:
• The custom-attribute id field cannot be set.
  • custom-attribute-name and custom-attribute-value are both required.
  • id and valueString for custom-attribute-name are required.
  • custom-attribute-value can be of type string, integer, dateTime, or CodeableConcept.
  • CodeableConcept can have the following systems:
    • https://fhir.cerner.com/<EHR source id>/nomenclature
    • https://fhir.cerner.com/<EHR source id>/codeSet/<code set>

fields.name: meta.security
fields.description: Security labels applied to this resource.
fields.note: Encounters created with meta.security set with code 'UNCERTREL' will be returned with an external encounter type.

binding.description: Security labels applied to this resource.
binding.note: Encounters created with meta.security set with code 'UNCERTREL' will be returned with an external encounter type.

fields.name: extension[x].extension[x].valueCodeableConcept
fields.description: The value of the client defined custom attribute. This extension is nested under a custom-attribute extension.

binding.description: The value of the client defined custom attribute. This binding is used for the custom-attribute-value extension nested under custom-attribute extensions.
binding.note:
• The terminology binding only applies when the custom-attribute-value extension is of type CodeableConcept.
  • The value of the custom attribute is not limited to a single Code Set or nomenclature.

fields.name: extension[x].valueMoney.currency
fields.description: Currency codes from ISO 4217 (see https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html).

binding.description: Currency codes from [ISO 4217](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html). This binding is used in estimated-financial-responsibility-amount extensions.

fields.name: extension[x].valueCodeableConcept
fields.description: The reason no estimated amount is collected for the encounter.

binding.description: The reason no estimated amount is collected for the encounter. This binding is used in estimated-financial-responsibility-not-collected-reason extensions.

terminology.display: Estimated Financial Responsibility Not Collected Reason

fields.name: extension[x].valueCodeableConcept
fields.description: Identifies whether an encounter is connected to military service.

binding.description: Identifies whether an encounter is connected to military service. This binding is used in military-service-connected-indicator extensions.

fields.name: extension[x].valueCodeableConcept
fields.description: The payment collection status

binding.description: The payment collection status. This binding is used in payment-collection-status extensions.

binding.note: Encounters created with meta.security set with code 'UNCERTREL' will be returned with an external encounter type.

fields.name: Custom Attribute Value Extension
fields.description: The value of the client defined custom attribute. This extension is nested under a custom-attribute extension.

binding.description: The value of the client defined custom attribute. This binding is used for the custom-attribute-value extension nested under custom-attribute extensions.
binding.note:
• The terminology binding only applies when the custom-attribute-value extension is of type CodeableConcept.
  • The value of the custom attribute is not limited to a single Code Set or nomenclature.

fields.name: Estimated Financial Responsibility Amount Extension
fields.description: Currency codes from ISO 4217 (see https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html).

binding.description: Currency codes from [ISO 4217](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html). This binding is used in estimated-financial-responsibility-amount extensions.

fields.name: Estimated Financial Responsibility Not Collected Reason Extension
fields.description: The reason no estimated amount is collected for the encounter.

binding.description: The reason no estimated amount is collected for the encounter. This binding is used in estimated-financial-responsibility-not-collected-reason extensions.

terminology.display: Estimated Financial Responsibility Not Collected Reason

fields.name: Military Service Connected Indicator Extension
fields.description: Identifies whether an encounter is connected to military service.

binding.description: Identifies whether an encounter is connected to military service. This binding is used in military-service-connected-indicator extensions.

fields.name: Payment Collection status Extension
fields.description: The payment collection status

binding.description: The payment collection status. This binding is used in payment-collection-status extensions.
